This file was produced by subsetting the sample non deconcatenated PacBio Kinnex scRNA-seq file, found [here](https://downloads.pacbcloud.com/public/dataset/MAS-Seq/DATA-Revio-Kinnex-HG002-10x5p/0-CCS/m84039_240124_190648_s3.hifi_reads.bcM0002.bam)
The command to do this can be found in `command-to-subsample.sh`
